translations.translation: And watch; they will come to know soon.
and see; and they too shall soon see.
and watch. They, too, will watch.
And wait, for they will soon see.
And watch and they shall see!
And (then) see, for they too shall see.
and see; soon they shall see!
And watch, for they will (soon) see.
And watch, for they will soon see.
And see thou: they themselves shall presently see.
and watch; soon they will see!
And watch (how they fare) and they soon shall see (how thou farest)!
And watch and they shall see (the torment)!
and see, soon they shall see!
And see, for they are going to see.
[37:179] and watch; for they will [soon] see — this [statement] is repeated in order to emphasise the threat made to them and to reassure the Prophet (s).
(And watch) and be aware, (for they will (soon) see) they will soon know what will be done to them.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَأَبْصِرْ } أياهم بعدما ألمَّ ونزل { فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ } [الصافات: 179] أي: أي شيء يترتب على إنكارهم، وتكذيبهم يوم الجزاء أولئك الضالون
